tastingNotesText.data:
The initial sip shows the complex luxury of berries drizzled with mocha and
caramel. A zesty explosion drenches the palette with a wonderful seasoning merger of wood and rye grain blending with tangy dark fruits.

description.data: Amplify your drinking experience by 10X with Platinum 10X Vodka. Platinum 10X Vodka is crafted using high-quality American corn, distilled 10 times and finished with 100% pure water for an exceptionally pure spirit with a clean, crisp taste. Great care and meticulous attention to detail create a craft vodka with a consistently smooth finish. Enjoy this 42 proof vodka liquor as a smooth vodka on the rocks, sip chilled or enjoy neat. Platinum vodka also tastes great in your favorite mixed drinks. Just add Platinum vodka liquor with your favorite alcohol mixers to create tasty cocktails like a vodka soda or vodka cranberry for 10X deliciousness. Platinum 10X is an American vodka that has a premium vodka taste without the premium vodka price tag. Store Platinum 10X Vodka at room temperature or in the freezer until youre ready to enjoy a remarkable vodka that delivers a memorable drinking experience every time. Taste the difference 10X over with Platinum 10X Vodka.

brandHighlight.data: Parrot Bay is a premium merge of fresh, rich flavors with a light, crisp Caribbean rum. This rum is designed to envelop your senses and transport you to your own pitstop in paradise.

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data: Escape from the day-to-day grind of life with Parrot Bay Coconut Rum. You can never go wrong with the delectable mixture of rich Caribbean white rum and the subtly sweet, creamy taste of natural coconut. Whether you're enjoying the latest season of your favorite show or vibing with your friends, open up a bottle of coconut flavored rum to indulge in the delicious flavors to savor your own mini staycation. Parrot Bay rum is 45% alcohol by volume for a drink you can enjoy neat or on the rocks. To make your personal tropical escape even more exciting, use Parrot Bay Coconut Rum liquor in mixed drinks and cocktails, whether its a pina colada, mai tai, daiquiri or Parrot Bay Breeze. Store Parrot Bay Coconut Rum at room temperature or keep it in your freezer for a chilled burst of tropical flavor. Trade the everyday for Parrot Bay.

description.data: Encourage socialization with Dr. McGillicuddys Irish Whiskey. The smooth, 100% Irish whiskey offers bold hints of fruit, vanilla, spice and honey; whether you want to pregame before a night out, watch the big game with great company or just enjoy a whiskey on the rocks, this classic alcoholic beverage has your back. Each bottle of Dr. McGillicuddys Irish whiskey is aged 3 years for a full-flavored, premium taste. At 40% alcohol, this Irish whiskey can be enjoyed straight out of the bottle for a smooth, sweet flavor. Perfect for any party or celebration with friends, the premium whiskey can be used in a multitude of spectacular alcoholic beverages and mixed drinks. Doctor your favorite hard seltzer with a shot for a great tasting mixed drink. Use this Irish whiskey with the Doctors other liqueurs to make a variety of delicious alcoholic beverages. Store Doctor McGillicuddys at room temperature or pour the spirits from your freezer to enjoy chilled. Please drink responsibly.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet and fruity with remarkable cognac characteristics, it isn't until the mid palate where the American oak notes truly emerge. While the oak is clearly there, it isn't overpowering nor does it overwhelm the other flavors including vanilla, caramel, iris, ginger, and raisin. The ginger from the mid palate combines with the oak spice to lead the finish which is slightly spicy, soft, and easy with a sweet and light undertone of caramel and fruit.

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data: Encourage socialization with Dr. McGillicuddys Irish Whiskey. The smooth, 100% Irish whiskey offers bold hints of fruit, vanilla, spice and honey; whether you want to pregame before a night out, watch the big game with great company or just enjoy a whiskey on the rocks, this classic alcoholic beverage has your back. Each bottle of Dr. McGillicuddys Irish whiskey is aged 3 years for a full-flavored, premium taste. At 21% alcohol, this Irish whiskey can be enjoyed straight out of the bottle for a smooth, sweet flavor. Perfect for any party or celebration with friends, the premium whiskey can be used in a multitude of spectacular alcoholic beverages and mixed drinks. Doctor your favorite hard seltzer with a shot for a great tasting mixed drink. Use this Irish whiskey with the Doctors other liqueurs to make a variety of delicious alcoholic beverages. Store Doctor McGillicuddys at room temperature or pour the spirits from your freezer to enjoy chilled. Please drink responsibly.

brandHighlight.data:
Established in 1860, Early Times is a true American brand. The name itself is a tribute to the way whisky was made in the "Early Times" of the country. As the Twentieth Century arrived and distilling methods evolved to sophisticated operations Early Times remained true to its roots as an old-style Kentucky bourbon.  

During the turbulent 1940s, Early Times proudly introduced Bottled-in-Bond Bourbon to the satisfaction of the heroic, hard-working men and women of that era. And in the decade that followed, Early Times became America's top-selling bourbon. Today, Early Times Bottled-in-Bond Bourbon carries on this rich heritage of the Early Times legacy.

brandHighlight.data: Dr. McGillicuddy's provides a great tasting, friendly buzz. Dr. McGillicuddy's flavors are intense and far superior to the competition. Our tasty spirits come in 10 flavors ranging from Mentholmint to Cherry.

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data: Encourage socialization with Dr. McGillicuddys Cherry Liqueur. The cherry liqueur offers a sweet aroma and intense, mouthwatering flavor; whether you want to pregame before a night out, watch the big game with great company or simply want to kill your beer breath, this classic alcoholic beverage has your back. Each bottle of Dr. McGillicuddys Cherry liqueur drinks has zero sugar and zero calories per 1.5 ounce shot. At 15% alcohol, this cherry liqueur can be enjoyed straight out of the bottle for a sweet cherry flavor. Perfect for any party or celebration with friends, these liqueur shots can be used in a multitude of spectacular alcoholic beverages and mixed drinks. Doctor your favorite hard seltzer with a shot for a great tasting mixed drink. Use this cherry liqueur shot with the Doctors other liqueurs to make a variety of delicious alcoholic beverages. Store Doctor McGillicuddys at room temperature or pour the spirits from your freezer for a chilled shot. Please drink responsibly.

description.data: FRS Vodka is distilled four times then Freeze Filtered in sub-zero temperatures to remove any impurities. As a result, FRS is a clean, crisp vodka with a smooth taste.

tastingNotesText.data: Neutral aroma, silky with hint of nougat on the finish.

text.data: GOVERNMENT WARNING: (1) ACCORDING TO THE SURGEON GENERAL WOMEN SHOULD NOT DRINK ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES DURING PREGNANCY BECAUSE OF THE RISK OF BIRTH DEFECTS. (2) CONSUMPTION OF ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES IMPAIRS YOUR ABILITY TO DRIVE A CAR OR OPERATE MACHINERY, AND MAY CAUSE HEALTH PROBLEMS.

FRS isn't your uptown, uptight, up-in-a-fancy-glass kind of vodka. It's the kick-back, grow-into-your-own, no-rules type of spirit. Plus, it's freeze-filtered for maximum smoothness, so it's designed to be served cold and always chill

We stand tall with the purists of having a good timewhatever and wherever that is to you. Curate your own occasionyour way. Just pour up some of "The World's Chillest Vodka" and enjoy an ultra smooth, ultra chill drinking experience
No pretention. No FRLLS. Just ultra-modern, ultra-smooth vodka fit for the chillest of times

Since our vodka is made cold, it's best served that way. Drink it in frozen cocktails, serve it chilled, or on the rocks. However you choose, keep it cold and enjoy the chll vibes it comes with. Checkout our Facebook for more recipes

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data:
In pursuit of perfection, we developed Platinum 10X vodka. It is vodka redefined and refined  a perfect balance of taste and design; offered at an accessible price point.

description.data: Define your moment with the sweet, lush flavor of Paul Masson Peach Brandy. Crafted using only the finest grapes and sweet peaches, PM Peach Brandy is a delectable fusion of Paul Masson Grande Amber brandy and peach flavor. Individually aged at least four years, this dark amber brandy features tasting notes of oak spice, ginger, vanilla, dark chocolate and the subtle, yet refined, presence of the American oak bourbon barrel. Paul Masson Peach Brandy tastes great served on the rocks at 27% alcohol by volume and is the perfect complement to your favorite mixer. Enjoy this liqueur in a Peach Moscato or Peach Tea or use PM Peach for a flavorful twist on classic brandy cocktails like a sidecar, sazerac or French 75. For more than 70 years, Paul Masson spirits have provided great flavor and smooth taste to elevate any social occasion. Store Paul Masson at room temperature until youre ready to enjoy the ultimate blend of American brandy. For moments at ease, Paul Masson Flavors bring a relaxed, chilled out vibe to the table.

brandHighlight.data: Southern Comfort is the original ready-for-anything whiskey. It's been an American icon since 1874. Sip it, mix it, shake it, blend it. Any way you like it. This is whiskey on its own terms. Made to be enjoyed on yours.

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data: Enjoy a one-of-a-kind spirit at its most laid back with Southern Comfort Original Whiskey. SoCo Original is an easy-drinking whiskey without the overpowering harshness of other whiskeys. Made with traditional American craftsmanship since 1874, Southern Comfort is made following M. W. Herons recipe. The tastes of stone fruits and spices combine for a blended whiskey that is smooth and easygoing with that just-right balance of sweetness and spice. Whether youre trying this 21% alcohol by volume spirit for the first time or enjoying it as a seasoned whiskey drinker, Southern Comfort Original Whiskey is so tasteful every time. SoCo liquor is satisfying neat, on the rocks or as a shot - no fruit required - and is equally delicious in your favorite mixed drinks. From a SoCo whiskey sour or old fashioned to a maple bacon Manhattan, no other spirit is so tasteful however you drink it or whoever you drink it with. True to the spirit of the Big Easy, Southern Comfort is whiskey on its own terms made to be enjoyed on yours. SoCo. So tasteful.

brandHighlight.data: Founded in 1879 in Kingston, Jamaica, Myers's represents over a century of authentic Rum heritage, pride, and history. The Myers's commitment to producing the highest quality, genuine Jamaican rum drove this brand to global recognition.

description.data:
Founded in 1879 in Kingston, Jamaica, Myers's represents over 140 years of authentic Rum heritage, pride, and history. The Myers's commitment to producing the highest quality, genuine Jamaican rum drove this brand to global recognition; today, we are proud to honor that legacy by using only the finest ingredients in every bottle.

Myers's Rum is produced from pure sugarcane juice that is boiled into molasses, fermented, and expertly distilled using both continuous and pot still distillation methods. After distillation, the rum is matured in white oak barrels. It is this final aging period that contributes to Myers's distinctive color, aroma, and taste guaranteed to elevate our drink.

Experience buttery notes upon entry followed by sweet sugar cane, caramel, tobacco, leather, honey, and dark chocolate with elements of raisin and fig. The finish has a decadent dark chocolate character with brown sugar, smokiness and underlying oak notes that make Myers's a genuine original that stands the test of time. 

Enjoy our signature Myers's Planters' Punch:
- 1 part squeezed lime juice
- 2 parts simple syrup 
- 3 parts Myers's Original Dark Rum
- Dash of bitters
- Orange slice (for garnish)
Mix ingredients in a shaker filled with ice and shake well. Serve in highball glass filled with shaved ice nd garnish with an orange slice.

Celebrate 140 years of rum-making tradition passed down straight to your glass with one of our signature cocktails or craft your own favorite.

text.data: Founded in 1879 in Kingston, Jamaica, Myers's represents over a century of authentic Rum heritage, pride, and history. The Myers's commitment to producing the highest quality, genuine Jamaican rum drove this brand to global recognition
Produced from pure sugarcane juice that is boiled into molasses, fermented, and expertly distilled using both continuous and pot still distillation methods
In 1879, when the first export of Myers's Rum left the island of Jamaica, you could taste the pure molasses it was made from. Myers's Rum still lingers on your tongue with authentic Jamaican flavor
Our rum is matured in white oak barrels where Myers's gets its distinctive color, aroma, and taste

brandHighlight.data: Seagram's VO is an iconic Canadian Whisky introduced in 1914 by Joseph E. Seagram as a special blend of his finest whiskies to celebrate his son's wedding.

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data: Savor the iconic taste of Canadas premier whisky with Seagrams VO Canadian Whisky. A blend of more than 50 whiskies each aged for at least six years, Seagrams VO is an impeccable blended whiskey with a full-bodied aroma and taste. Scents of autumn fruit and wine set the stage for tasting notes of creamy vanilla, orange, cherry, maple water, caramel, rye cereal, pepper, cinnamon and ginger in the background. Its exceptionally mellow taste is delicate on the palate with a warm, satisfying finish. This special blend of whiskies is 40% alcohol by volume, making Seagrams VO Whisky perfect on its own on the rocks or for your favorite mixed drinks. Try this hard liquor with cranberry juice or club soda over ice to concoct a refreshing whiskey cocktail. Seagram's VO Imported Premium Canadian Whisky is crafted to provide consistent quality and reliability no matter how you drink it. Enjoy the whisky blend that Joseph Seagram introduced to celebrate his sons wedding with Seagrams VO Canadian Whisky.

tastingNotesText.data: On the palate, the texture is fat and amorous, a bit viscous too. Corn syrup, creamy vanilla, oranges, cherries, maple water, pears and apricots, caramel, rye cereal, pepper, a touch of burnt wood, cinnamon and ginger in the background. Sweet, languid finish, over corn syrup and caramel.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet and fruity with remarkable cognac characteristics, it isn't until the mid palate where the American oak notes truly emerge. While the oak is clearly there, it isn't overpowering nor does it overwhelm the other flavors including vanilla, caramel, iris, ginger, and raisin. Individually aged at least four years, this dark amber brandy features tasting notes of oak spice, ginger, vanilla, dark chocolate and the subtle, yet refined, presence of the American oak bourbon barrel. Paul Masson Apple Brandy tastes great served on the rocks at 27% alcohol by volume and is the perfect complement to your favorite mixer. Enjoy this liqueur in a Apple Ade Sangria or PM Apple Press, or use PM Apple Brandy for a flavorful twist on classic brandy cocktails like a sidecar, sazerac or French 75. For more than 70 years, Paul Masson spirits have provided great flavor and smooth taste to elevate any social occasion. description.data: Escape from the day-to-day grind of life with Parrot Bay Coconut Rum. You can never go wrong with the delectable mixture of rich Caribbean white rum and the subtly sweet, creamy taste of natural coconut. Whether you're enjoying the latest season of your favorite show or vibing with your friends, open up a bottle of coconut flavored rum to indulge in the delicious flavors to savor your own mini staycation. Parrot Bay rum is 45% alcohol by volume for a drink you can enjoy neat or on the rocks. To make your personal tropical escape even more exciting, use Parrot Bay Coconut Rum liquor in mixed drinks and cocktails, whether its a pina colada, mai tai, daiquiri or Parrot Bay Breeze. Store Parrot Bay Coconut Rum at room temperature or keep it in your freezer for a chilled burst of tropical flavor. Trade the everyday for Parrot Bay.

description.data: Define your moment with the sweet, lush flavor of Paul Masson Mango Brandy. Crafted using only the finest grapes and sweet mangoes, PM Mango Brandy is a delectable fusion of Paul Masson Grande Amber brandy and mango flavor. Individually aged at least four years, this dark amber brandy features tasting notes of oak spice, ginger, vanilla, dark chocolate and the subtle, yet refined, presence of the American oak bourbon barrel. Paul Masson Mango Brandy tastes great served on the rocks at 27% alcohol by volume and is the perfect complement to your favorite mixer. Enjoy this liqueur in a Mango Iced Tea or Breezy, or use PM Mango for a flavorful twist on classic brandy cocktails like a sidecar, sazerac or French 75. For more than 70 years, Paul Masson spirits have provided great flavor and smooth taste to elevate any social occasion. Store Paul Masson at room temperature until youre ready to enjoy the ultimate blend of American brandy. For moments at ease, Paul Masson Flavors bring a relaxed, chilled out vibe to the table.

brandHighlight.data: Fireball Cinnamon Whisky needs no introduction. Just imagine what it feels like to stand face-to-face with a fire-breathing dragon who just ate a whisky barrel full of spicy cinnamon.

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data: Free Your Fire with the heavenly taste and ferocious burn of Fireball Cinnamon Whisky Peel & Party Shots. Fireball is the perfectly blended Canadian whisky made with real cinnamon for a fiery kick of red hot cinnamon flavor. Fireball is Americas #1 shot brand and #1 whiskey brand, making this cinnamon whisky the iconic choice for celebrating with friends at home or your favorite bar. At 33% alcohol by volume, a Fireball shot is the perfect whiskey shot for pregaming before a chill night out. Fireball Canadian Whisky also tastes great when enjoyed straight or added to your favorite mixed drinks or a classic cocktail. The cinnamon flare of Fireball hard liquor also enhances your favorite hard seltzer, hard cider and other alcoholic drinks. With countless ways to enjoy Fireball Cinnamon Whisky, bending the rules is easy - and delicious. Store Fireball at room temperature or store and pour straight from your freezer to enjoy an icy, spicy shot. Fireball is one of a kind, not to be replaced by any other copycat cinnamon whiskey. Fireball tastes like heaven and burns like hell.

tastingNotesText.data: The flavor of Fireball is unlike anything else. Even other cinnamon whiskies are difficult to compare. The drink goes down smooth, and as the branding will have you know, it's fiery. It's warming in the belly and flavorful on the tongue. You'll get the flavor of a cinnamon candy with all the spicy and sweet tones that you've always loved.

brandHighlight.data:
Established in 1860, Early Times is a true American brand. The name itself is a tribute to the way whisky was made in the "Early Times" of the country. As the Twentieth Century arrived and distilling methods evolved to sophisticated operations Early Times remained true to its roots as an old-style Kentucky bourbon.  

During the turbulent 1940s, Early Times proudly introduced Bottled-in-Bond Bourbon to the satisfaction of the heroic, hard-working men and women of that era. And in the decade that followed, Early Times became America's top-selling bourbon. Today, Early Times Bottled-in-Bond Bourbon carries on this rich heritage of the Early Times legacy.

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data: Early Times Kentucky Whisky is known for being a high-quality whisky that delivers a consistently smooth taste and flavor profile while still being offered at an attractive price to consumers. Aged a minimum of three years in heat-cycled warehouses and barreled in seasoned American white oak barrels.

Taste: Corn notes with hints of delicate oak, brown sugar, and soft vanilla joined by traces of herbal spice

brandHighlight.data: Created through true Italian craftsmanship, Hartley is a distinctively smooth and superior brandy.

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data:
Hartley is an imported VSOP Brandy is aged in oak casks for four years. The result is an elegant, superior brandy with a complex bouquet of flavor.  

Bright copper in color, Hartley VSOP delights with a rich aroma of fresh buttered rum cake that wafts through the nose. The palate is an opulent smorgasbord of rich fruits. Asian pear, orange peel and juicy apricots drizzled with vanilla shine brightly. The finish is clean and crisp leaving the senses refreshed.

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

FRS isn't your uptown, uptight, up-in-a-fancy-glass kind of vodka. It's the kick-back, grow-into-your-own, no-rules type of spirit. Plus, it's freeze-filtered for maximum smoothness, so it's designed to be served cold and always chill

We stand tall with the purists of having a good timewhatever and wherever that is to you. Curate your own occasionyour way. Just pour up some of "The World's Chillest Vodka" and enjoy an ultra smooth, ultra chill drinking experience
No pretention. No FRLLS. Just ultra-modern, ultra-smooth vodka fit for the chillest of times

description.data: Liven up your experience with the exciting flavor of 99 Brand Peach Liqueur. With 27 cordials flavors and growing, 99 is America's #1 cordials brand. These liqueur shots are an amazing way to celebrate the good times and chill vibes. Each bottle of 99 Brand Peach liqueur has zero sugar and 155 calories per 1.5 ounce shot. At 21% alcohol, 99 can be enjoyed straight out of the bottle as shots for a burst of tasty peach flavor. Perfect for any party or celebration with friends, 99 Peaches tastes great in a multitude of spectacular alcoholic beverages, cocktails and mixed drinks. Add a splash to your hard seltzer for a full flavor explosion or combine this peach liqueur with other 99 Brand liqueurs, like 99 Apples, to make a variety of delicious alcoholic beverages. Store 99 Peaches at room temperature or pour it from your freezer for an icy shot. Live life in color with 99 Brand Liqueur. Please drink responsibly.

Fix your drink any way you like it. On the rocks, with soda, juice, whatever's handy. One delicious sip, and you feel like yourself.

brandHighlight.data: February 4, 1862. The Bacard family, led by Don Facundo Bacard Mass, buy a distillery in Santiago de Cuba. They throw away the rule book and make their own unique blends with a revolutionary rum-making process that would change the way rum was made forever. One family - over 150 years of rum-making expertise.

description.data: Created in 1862, BACARD Reserva Ocho rum is one of the oldest private rum blends in the world. For seven generations, the Bacard family enjoyed it as their personal reserve. Happily, today everyone can enjoy this golden sipping rum and create special moments together.

tastingNotesText.data: BACARD Reserva Ocho rum boasts warming notes of butterscotch, nutmeg and dried apricots. Longer aging brings out additional complexity of flavors from the barrel and develops a rich body with velvety smoothness. Rich mahogany in hue.

text.data: WARNING: Drinking distilled spirits, beer, coolers, wine and other alcoholic beverages may increase cancer risk, and, during pregnancy, can cause birth defects. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/alcohol.

Aged in American white oak barrels and filtered through charcoal for a distinctive smoothness
This aged rum offers a smooth, complex taste thats easy to casually sip and enjoy
This BACARDI rum delivers a deep, layered and mellow flavor of dried fruits, spices and oaky vanilla
Enjoy this hard liquor neat, on the rocks, or mix into a cocktail like an Old Fashioned, Rum Negroni or Old Cuban

brandHighlight.data: Tequila Mi CAMPO is a modern expression of the centuries-old art of tequila-making. Whats in the glass is more than a spirit. Its history reimagined. Heritage grounds but doesn't limit; rather it blends with fresh ways of thinking for a new generation of tequila drinkers. Tequila Mi CAMPO is a confluence of passions  for handcrafted tequila, for culture, for the artisans who blend tradition with originality. The brand partners with evocative Mxico City illustrator Raul Urias, whose aesthetic brings the ethos of Mi CAMPO to life through his art. Tequila Mi CAMPO starts with the pure blue agave of Jalisco, fermented among fragrant local citrus trees. Tequila-makers gently squeeze the pias  never crushing them  to release flavorful juices without any bitter notes. After fermentation, the tequila is aged in coveted French oak wine barrels from Napa Valley. Tequila Mi CAMPO has reinterpreted tradition to create a richer, smoother tequila rooted in the spirit of modern Mxico.

description.data: Mi Campo Blanco Tequila is a contemporary take on traditional agave tequila. Crafted using high-quality, 100% blue weber agave, this clear, 80-proof tequila liquor has touches of silver sparkle. A tequila blanco created with passion and pride in the land from which it comes, this smooth-drinking tequila offers layered aromas of cooked agave, banana, fresh coconut, almonds, sweet orange, and green apple along with hints of elegant vanilla. On the palate, orange blossom tea underscores threads of honey and sweet orange, balanced by subtle white pepper notes. The agave pinas used to make this straight-from-the-corazn tequila are not crushed but rather squeezed before being cooked in stone ovens. Double-distilled in alembic stills, this 1.75 L bottle of tequila alcohol is aged for three weeks in chardonnay barrels for a richer, smoother finish that's a reinterpretation of tradition. Enjoy a Mi Campo tequila and orange juice, a tequila mojito, or any number of the best tequila drinks, raising a toast to the spirit of modern Mexico. Salud! Please enjoy responsibly.  2024 Imported by Mi Campo Spirits, Canandaigua, NY. Tequila. 40% alc. By vol.

tastingNotesText.data:
Smooth-drinking tequila with cooked agave, banana, coconut, almond, orange, green apple, vanilla, and honey notes
. Balanced tequila alcohol with a rich, smooth finish
.
